intro: Pilidiostigma glabrum, commonly known as the smooth pilidiostigma, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweeds and related species. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, clustered flowers that are typically greenish-yellow in color. Its leaves are simple, opposite, and have a smooth texture, contributing to its common name. Pilidiostigma glabrum is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments.
